fields.title: command
fields.value: `add me <your desk location> or xam <your desk location>`

fields.title: action
fields.value: Adds your Desk location so that friends can find you
`update me <your desk location> or xum <your desk location>`
Updates your Desk location
`am at <your present location> or xaa <your present location>`
Updates your Present location
`add room <Meeting Room Name> description <Meeting Room location> or xar <Meeting Room Name> description <Meeting Room location>`
Adds a meeting Room location so that people can locate it
`update room <Meeting Room Name> description <Meeting Room location> or xur <Meeting Room Name> description <Meeting Room location>`
Updates a meeting Room location
`update room <Meeting Room Name> imageurl <Meeting Room location> or xur <Meeting Room Name> description <Meeting Room location>`
Updates a meeting Room visual description
`add item <Item Name> description <Item location> or xai <Item Name> description <Item location>`
Adds an Item location so that people can locate it
`update item <Item Name> description <Item location> or xui <Item Name> description <Item location>`
Updates an item's location
`update item <Item Name> imageurl <Item location> or xur <Item Name> description <Item location>`
Updates an item's visual description
`where is <username> or xwi <username>`
Find a user's Present location or Desk
`where is room <Meeting Room Name> or xwir <Meeting Room Name>`
Find a Meeting Room's location
`where is item <Item Name> or xwii <Item Name>`
Find an item's location
